html: On this last day of Passover, a gunman has attacked a California synagogue. html: This Sexual Assault Awareness and Prevention Month, let's put an end to sexual assault, and ensure survivors are protected & heard. I urge my colleagues to pass my SAFE Act, so survivors will get the economic security they need to protect themselves. #SAAPM

html: This #EarthDay, let's remember that our environment is fragile and in dire need of protection. We must ensure a livable Earth for our children & grandchildren. As your congresswoman, I'll keep fighting for policies to combat climate change, and to clean our air, water, and land.
text: This #EarthDay, let's remember that our environment is fragile and in dire need of protection. We must ensure a livable Earth for our children & grandchildren. As your congresswoman, I'll keep fighting for policies to combat climate change, and to clean our air, water, and land.

html: As people around the world celebrate Easter today, we keep in our hearts the victims of the shocking terror attacks on churches and other sites in Sri Lanka. Everyone should be able to live their life and practice their faith in peace and safety.

html: Congress needs the full unredacted Mueller Report to conduct its legislative & oversight duties. Based on past investigations, DOJ has no reason to withold it. We can't rely on AG Barr & the White House's cherry-picked analysis to interpret this critical report for all Americans.

html: Imagine the hopelessness & helplessness that these migrant families must feel, as the cries of caged children and the screams of captive babies echo against the bridge and throughout the holding pen. This administration’s treatment of migrants is beneath all standards of decency.
text: Imagine the hopelessness & helplessness that these migrant families must feel, as the cries of caged children and the screams of captive babies echo against the bridge and throughout the holding pen. This administration’s treatment of migrants is beneath all standards of decency.

html: Imagine enduring danger and abuse on the journey to our border, because you literally have no other choice if you want to survive. Then, imagine finally getting to America’s border, only to be caged behind chain-link fencing under a bridge.
text: Imagine enduring danger and abuse on the journey to our border, because you literally have no other choice if you want to survive.  Then, imagine finally getting to America’s border, only to be caged behind chain-link fencing under a bridge.

html: If you're having trouble empathizing with the plight of migrants, I ask you to imagine having no choice but to flee your home country – leaving behind everyone and everything you know – because it’s your only chance to stay alive, or the only way to protect your children.
text: If you're having trouble empathizing with the plight of migrants, I ask you to imagine having no choice but to flee your home country – leaving behind everyone and everything you know – because it’s your only chance to stay alive, or the only way to protect your children.

html: As DHS Appropriations chair, I am closely monitoring the humanitarian crisis at the border, and will quickly review and respond to any emergency supplemental appropriations request to help DHS respond. We must ensure migrants in U.S. custody are kept safe and treated properly.
text: As DHS Appropriations chair, I am closely monitoring the humanitarian crisis at the border, and will quickly review and respond to any emergency supplemental appropriations request to help DHS respond. We must ensure migrants in U.S. custody are kept safe and treated properly.

text: In 30 states, #LGBTQ individuals are at risk of being fired, evicted, or denied services because of who they are. html: I am proud introduce #HR6 with @RepRoybalAllard & @RepYvetteClarke. This bill is designed to promote justice and fairness for Dreamers, & for the TPS & DED holders who had fled violence & natural disasters years ago to come to this country which they now call home.

#LaCongresista @RepSylviaGarcia accepts #RoybalGala19 Award, recounts her journey:

html: 77 years ago, the signing of Executive Order 9066 led to the incarceration of over 120,000 Japanese Americans. On this Day of Remembrance of Japanese incarceration, we reflect on this shameful chapter in our history & recommit to protecting the rights & freedoms of all Americans.

html: Instead of funding Trump’s so-called emergency wall, we must hire more customs officers; keep deploying effective border security tech; hire more law enforcement for opioid, trade, and child exploitation investigations; and ensure our Coast Guard can protect U.S. interests.

.@RepRoybalAllard says the topline for the Homeland Security spending bill is about $49.1 billion and that Democrats aren't planning to use emergency spending as a way to spend more. 

"We're not going to do gimmicks and these other things that are in some of the other bills."

html: To ensure the federal government can meet the needs of disaster victims, our disaster supplemental bill reopens the govt and ends the #TrumpShutdown. Again and again, the House Majority has voted to #EndTheShutdown. I urge @SenateGOP to finally join us, for our nation’s sake!

html: Today, I joined the House in passing an urgently needed disaster funding bill. These funds will help California recover from the wildfires that have devastated our state, and help other U.S. communities rebuild from hurricanes, typhoons, and other natural disasters.

html: Now, with the future health of our children at stake, I urge the FDA to go further and remove tobacco products that are marketed in ways that appeal to kids, including all flavored e-cigarette products that have not been subject to public health review.
text: Now, with the future health of our children at stake, I urge the FDA to go further and remove tobacco products that are marketed in ways that appeal to kids, including all flavored e-cigarette products that have not been subject to public health review.

html: I thank the @US_FDA for taking new action against flavored cigars, menthol cigarettes, and e-cigarettes. html: On my visit to @ChildrensLA’s #Newborn & #Infant Critical Care Unit, I spoke w/ doctors about the critically important research being done on #CongenitalSmallLung, also known as #PulmonaryHypoplasia, a dangerous neonatal lung condition affecting approximately 1 in 1000 #newborns.pic.twitter.com/nwKS9K3BXO

html: I visited the #PuebloDelRio housing project in #SouthLA and met with local leaders. I appreciated learning more about Pueblo Del Rio, the services it provides, the renovations taking place, and the amazing youth and community programs offered to local residents.pic.twitter.com/j5JUbCD3LB

html: We must have an FBI investigation of the allegations against Judge Kavanaugh. The Senate has no business rushing to a vote, especially after the fully credible testimony Dr. Ford gave yesterday. Why don't Republicans want a full investigation? What are they afraid it would find?
text: We must have an FBI investigation of the allegations against Judge Kavanaugh. The Senate has no business rushing to a vote, especially after the fully credible testimony Dr. Ford gave yesterday. Why don't Republicans want a full investigation? What are they afraid it would find?

html: Make no mistake: After Dr. Ford's 100% credible testimony, voting for Judge Kavanaugh—especially without a full FBI investigation—sends a message to assault survivors that they should stay quiet, and gives comfort to assaulters everywhere. Shame on any senator who supports him.
text: Make no mistake: After Dr. Ford's 100% credible testimony, voting for Judge Kavanaugh—especially without a full FBI investigation—sends a message to assault survivors that they should stay quiet, and gives comfort to assaulters everywhere. Shame on any senator who supports him.

text: My heart breaks for Pamela, who miscarried after she tripped while shackled in prison. No pregnant woman should ever face inhumane treatment. html: We must do all we can to #EndChildPoverty. That's why I led the effort to fund a @theNASciences study of U.S. #ChildPoverty, which will give recommendations on how to cut child poverty in half in 10 years. The study is now underway, & I look forward to its results! #ValueOurKids
text: We must do all we can to #EndChildPoverty. That's why I led the effort to fund a @theNASciences study of U.S. #ChildPoverty, which will give recommendations on how to cut child poverty in half in 10 years. The study is now underway, & I look forward to its results! #ValueOurKids

html: Latinos make up 46% of Metro’s rail ridership and 66% of Metro’s bus ridership. Latinos are underrepresented in the decision-making of our transit infrastructure. text: Latinos make up 46% of Metro’s rail ridership and 66% of Metro’s bus ridership. Latinos are underrepresented in the decision-making of our transit infrastructure. html: Thinking of Addie Mae Collins, Denise McNair, Carole Robertson, and Cynthia Wesley, four African-American girls murdered 55 years ago today when Klansmen bombed Birmingham's 16th St Baptist Church. As we remember, let us renew our resolve to fight all forms of bigotry and hate.

html: This #HungerActionMonth, let's remember that 1 in 7 LA County residents are battling hunger. I'm fighting in Congress for SNAP, WIC, free & reduced-price school lunches, and other programs that will help us move toward the day when no man, woman, or child goes hungry in the U.S.
